name: Granotone Spray Grade Speaker Cabinet Texture Coating BLACK Functional Wall Paint (800 ml)
description: Premium quality texture coating for speaker cabinets and walls.

about: Superior Coverage - Dulux Promise offers exceptional coverage, allowing you to achieve your desired result with fewer coats. This feature saves you both time and effort during the painting process.
Durable Protection - The paint offers long-lasting protection to exterior surfaces, shielding them from the elements and maintaining their appearance over years.
Vibrant and Opulent Finish - Dulux Promise provides a vibrant and elegant finish that enhances the aesthetic appeal of your home, helping it stand out in your neighborhood.
Hassle-Free Application - The paint is designed for easy mixing and smooth application, whether you're a DIY enthusiast or a professional painter, ensuring a seamless and hassle-free experience.
Weather-Resistance - Regardless of weather conditions, this paint maintains its quality and appearance, offering protection against rain, sun, and wind exposure.

name: Luxor Glossy Finish Premium Wall Paint (1L)
description: High gloss finish for a stunning look on your walls.

about: High Gloss Finish - Luxor Glossy Finish provides a stunning shine, making your walls stand out with elegance.
Durable Protection - This paint offers excellent protection against scratches and scuffs, ensuring a long-lasting finish.
Easy Application - The paint flows smoothly, making it easy to apply with minimal effort.
Weather-Resistant - Suitable for both interior and exterior surfaces, withstanding various weather conditions.
Eco-Friendly - Formulated with environmentally friendly materials, making it safe for your home and the environment.

name: AquaShield Exterior Wall Paint (5L)
description: Superior protection against weather elements for exterior walls.

about: Waterproof - Provides superior protection against rain and moisture, keeping your walls dry.
Long-Lasting - Offers a durable finish that withstands harsh weather conditions.
Easy to Apply - Flows smoothly for a hassle-free painting experience.
UV Resistant - Protects against the sun's UV rays, preventing color fading.
Eco-Friendly - Made with safe and eco-friendly materials.

name: EcoFriendly Interior Emulsion Paint (10L)
description: Eco-friendly interior paint with a smooth finish.

about: Low VOC - Eco-friendly formula with low volatile organic compounds for a healthier environment.
Smooth Finish - Provides a smooth and elegant finish to interior walls.
Easy Application - Designed for easy and efficient application.
Durable Protection - Offers long-lasting protection against everyday wear and tear.
Safe for Home - Non-toxic and safe for use in homes with children and pets.

name: QuickDry Fast-Drying Paint (2.5L)
description: Fast-drying paint for quick and efficient painting projects.

about: Fast-Drying - Dries quickly, allowing for faster project completion.
High Gloss Finish - Provides a glossy and shiny finish.
Durable - Offers long-lasting protection and vibrant colors.
Easy Application - Smooth and easy to apply with minimal effort.
Weather-Resistant - Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

name: UltraCover Premium Exterior Paint (3L)
description: High-performance exterior paint for ultimate protection.

about: High Durability - Offers maximum protection and long-lasting durability.
Superior Coverage - Covers large areas with fewer coats.
Weather-Proof - Protects against harsh weather conditions.
Easy to Apply - Smooth application for a flawless finish.
Eco-Friendly - Safe for the environment and your home.
